Pantheon.name: Pantheon
Pantheon.hint1: This champion is voiced by the same person that voiced Varus and Blood Lord Vladimir
Pantheon.hint3: Has a secret dream of baking

Zilean.name: Zilean
Zilean.hint1: confirmed to be the last Icathian mage
Zilean.hint2: During development he was called Narib Newmaiss
Zilean.hint3: Has the quote: 'In my day, we would never have allowed an armored bear into the League of Legends'

Blitzcrank.name: Blitzcrank
Blitzcrank.hint3: man hook car man hook door

Thresh.name: Thresh
Thresh.hint3: man hook car man hook door

Annie.name: Annie
Annie.hint1: Voiced by the same person that did Amumu and Nunu
Annie.hint2: Has the third highest amount of skins in the game
Annie.hint3: Ult has the highest AP cast ratio

Singed.name: Singed
Singed.hint1: One of the first six champions designed by Riot
Singed.hint2: Dance references the Fresh Prince of Bel-Air

Senna.name: Senna
Senna.hint1: Does not gain AD upon level-up
Senna.hint2: Longest Attack frame in the game
Senna.hint3: Present in lore before being released as a champion

Sylas.name: Sylas
Sylas.hint1: Has an animation for a cancelled recall
Sylas.hint2: Had Blooming Burst as an ability in development

Aatrox.name: Aatrox
Aatrox.hint2: Had an in-development ability where he "Creating a “war zone” that grants those who died in it reduced death timers and would respawn allies at the closest structure."

Varus.name: Varus
Varus.hint1: One of the few champions to apply CC on themself
Varus.hint3: "The cost of your life is one arrow."
